verses.verse: A Song of Ascents. Behold, <S%H1288>bless<s%> ye <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, all ye <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, That by <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
Lift <S%H5375>up<s%> your <S%H3027>hands<s%> to the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>, And <S%H1288>bless<s%> ye <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> thee out of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>; Even he that <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth<s%>.
